institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 7-3 (Disclosure of Deliberation Committee Operation)
contents: Article 7-3 (Disclosure of Deliberation Committee Operations) ① When a meeting is convened, the chairperson shall notify the deliberation committee members of the date, time, place, and agenda of the meeting in writing or electronically (posting on website, sending text message, email notification, etc.) at least 5 days prior to the holding date. must be notified accordingly. However, this does not apply when there is an emergency or unavoidable reason. ② The head of the relevant department must record the following matters in the meeting minutes. However, in the case of committees for simple deliberation, written deliberation, quantitative evaluation, etc., it can be replaced with evaluation results, resolutions, etc. 1. Name of the meeting, 2. Date and place of the meeting, 3. List of attendees and attendees, 4. Order of proceedings and proposed agenda, 5. Summary of remarks and decisions (results of voting), 6. Other necessary matters, ③ The secretary After the meeting minutes are written, they must be confirmed and signed by all attending members, including the chairperson, and stored through the electronic record production system. ④ The secretary prepares meeting minutes or meeting results and discloses them on the Corporation's website, etc. within 14 days. However, if the chairperson determines that it is necessary to protect it as a trade secret or if there is concern about social repercussions from disclosure, the meeting minutes may not be disclosed by specifying the reason. Newly established 2019. 12. 26
